_INFO_1: ->>> CHECK: Keep in mind that star needs 30Go for a human genome. So adapt the number of threads accordingly...
_INFO_2: ->>> CHECK: Did you check that your GTF only contains 'exon' lines ?
_INFO_3: ->>> CHECK: Did you check that your STAR index is compatible with your STAR version ?
_INFO_4: ->>> CHECK: Sample name should not contain the '_plus.' or '_min.' character string.
_INFO_5: ->>> CHECK: THE SAMPLE NAMES SHOULD ONLY CONTAIN ALPHANUMERIC and '_' CHARACTERS.
_INFO_6: ->>> CHECK: For 'comparison' indicate sample like this (space stands for 'versus'): control,control1 treated1,treated2.
_INFO_7: ->>> CHECK: ChromInfo (chrom size) file should have no header.
_INFO_8: ->>> CHECK: Use cufflinks 2.1.1 if you encounter segfault.
_INFO_9: ->>> CHECK: Better to set gene_name attribute of gtf file to 'gene_id|gene_name'.
_INFO_10: ->>> NOTE: The 'classes' key is used for PCA diagram.
_INFO_11: ->>> NOTE: total_cov_objective should be ~ (expected mapped nbRead) * readSize
_INFO_12: ->>> CHECK: chrom_list is intended to select only chromosome of interest for the subsequent analysis. Check it !! (IT IS FOR MOUSE BY DEFAULT)
samples: DM2_chr18 DM1_chr18 DM3_chr18 PI1_chr18 PI2_chr18 PI3_chr18
classes: DM DM DM PI PI PI
